name: yl-portal
description: Employee portal and expense management for YoungLife

scripts.kill-port: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const port = process.argv[1]; try { const cmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? `for /f \"tokens=5\" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| findstr :${port}') do taskkill /F /PID %a` : `lsof -ti:${port} | xargs kill -9`; execSync(cmd, {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('No process found on port', port); }" --
